name: AS_GCM_CopyClauseSetClausesActionEnabled_v1_default
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents whether or not the Copy Clause Set action is available 
from both the clause sets grid and an individual clause set.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: true - Enabled

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: 
1. Replace true with false if the Copy Clause Set action needs to be disabled
2. the value of this expression should only be one of the two available below


EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean with the value of true or false

*/
true
